text:
This is gonna be a super funny ordering experience. The charm is in the shopkeeper who doesn’t really speak English but who has a great smile and follows it up with his thumbs up sign.

We got teh tarik siu dai. Our “less sweet” orders were still pretty sweet. I think the only way to get “siu Dai” is to tell him kosong. But all in all, 5 stars cause of the shopkeeper
Great service and tasty teh tarik served with joy and a twinkle in the eye.
Teh Halia iced for $2.50- not too sweet and the Halia is definitely strong enough. Good stuff!

🥤 Adam Drink Stall is actually open  they must have forgotten to update in Google search 😅 one of the favourite crowd with long queue of hungry workers buying & great spot for tourists & locals, highly recommend as their drinks sells at reasonable price with machine secured wrapped so you not worry the spills, very good 👍🏻 service, mutton & potato curry puff look 👀 super fresh at 5pm 🕔 on 15 June 2023.

Their lime juice, less sweet, I think is the best in Singapore.  No shortcuts, just freshly squeezed juicy limes, a touch of sugar dissolved in hot water, poured over ice.  Just perfect, even if the price varies a bit.
